Authors and Contributors<authors>

The authors element is provided to give credit to the people that made contributions to the creation of a map. Their minecraft usernames are listed in a variety of locations while the map is being played.

Author<author>

An author is a person who contributed to the map in some way.


Author Attributes
AttributeDescriptionTypeDefault
contributor

If a player should be counted as a main author or as a contributor.

True/Falsefalse
uuid

The UUID of the player that should be credited.

Minecraft UUID
role

The specific task that the user performed.

Text
promo

A link to the player's website.

URL

Organisation <organization>

An organisation represents a group of people who helped with the map.


Organisation Attributes
AttributeDescriptionType
name

The name of the organisation.

Text
role

The specific task that the group performed.

Text
promo

A link to the group's website.

URL
